short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cardano exchange price ticker. Displays the current price on the badge icon. bittrex, binance, upbit, hitbtc pairs available

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ada price ticker for bittrex, binance, upbit and hitbtc exchanges and chart from tradingview.

There is several options available: exchange
pairs (ADA/BTC, ADA/ETH, ADA/USDT, ADA/KRW, ADA/USD)
update delay
chart
chart theme
